passive.description: [Plague]: Deals [Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage every3s for 13s. Stacks up to 10 times.When a target affected by [Plague] dies, deals  [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to up to 5 other nearbyenemies.

basicAttacks.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage and applies[Plague].
Casts for 1.2s, releasing a shockwave in the targetdirection; deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage toenemies in its path and applies [Plague].
Throws a pool of venom at the target location, lasting 3s,slowing enemies inside by 20% and inflicting [Plague]every second.

commonSkills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 125%] Magic Damage to target every0.7s, inflicts [Plague], and restores [Healing Rate: 25%]HPCannot move while channeling.

Launches Toxic Matter at the target. After hitting an enemy, it bounces to other enemies within 7m up to 9 times, with a maximum of 2 hits on the same target. Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage, applies 1 stack of [Plague], and reduces Magic Resistance by 20 for 6s.
Releases a plague surge in target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage to enemies hit,inflicting 2 stacks of [Plague] and reducing Speed by 30%for 4s.
While active, consumes 15 MP every 3s and inflicts[Plague] to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks have a 30%chance to miss for 9s.Use again to deactivate. Automatically deactivates whenMP is insufficient.

Summons a draining field at the target location, lasting6s. Slows enemies inside by 30% and inflicts [Exhaustion]every 1s for 6s, stacking up to 6 times. [Exhaustion]Damage Boost: -6% (-6% per stack, can stack)Healing Bonus: -6% (-6% per stack, can stack)Attack Speed: -6% (-6% per stack, can stack)

skills.description: After a 1s cast, doubles the stacks of [Plague] on anenemy target and refreshes the duration to maximum. Ifthe doubled stacks exceed the limit, deals ([Damage Rate: 55%] per stack) Magic Damage for excess stacks.If the target does not have [Plague], inflicts at least onestack of [Plague] and deals [Damage Rate: 55%] MagicDamage.

Channels for 0.5s to inflict 2 stacks of [Plague] as well as[Hexbound Malice] to enemies in range, lasting 9s.[Hexbound Malice]: Each active skill used consumes 10extra MP and inflicts [Damage Rate: 200%] MagicDamage.

Infects any target with Pestilence Source for 8s. Everysecond, deals [Damage Rate: 65%] Magic Damage to theinfected and nearby enemies. Inflicts 1 stack of [Plague]and reduces damage dealt by 5% to enemies except thecarrier for 4s, stacking up to 5 times.

Infects an enemy with [Parasites].[Parasites]: Parasites last 12s and deal [Damage Rate: 50%] True Damage whenever the target takes directdamage (minimum interval 0.8s). When dispelled, deals [Damage Rate: 350%] Magic Damage

Channels for 0.5s to curse a circular area. After a briefdelay, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage to up to10 enemies in range, dispeling all Buffs, shields, and HoTeffects, and inflicting [Crippled] for 6s. [Crippled]Cannot use movement skills or gain buffs, shields, or HoTeffectsMovement Speed Bonus: -50%

Throws a Necrotic Eruption device at the target location. Every 2 seconds, Death Clouds randomly spawn around the device (the device's range gradually expands), lasting for 10 seconds. The Death Clouds deal [Damage Rate: 60%] Magic Damage every second to enemy targets in range, inflicting [Plague], and reducing Healing Effect by 5% for 12 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

Plants a Bloom of Malice seed before channeling energyto it for 3s. The seed grows gradually until blooming(press skill again to bloom early). When blooming, deals [Damage Rate: 360%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies,inflicts [Plague] based on growth time, and reduces MaxHP by 2.5% for 12s (stacks up to 10 times).Effects increase with growth time ([Plague] stacks 1-2->3-10 / Max HP stacks 1 ->10)
